DOC.brief_summary: The main purpose explore whether atazanavir/ritonavir ( ATV/RTV ) single enhanced protease inhibitor therapy maintain virologic suppression without marked increase virologic failure .
DOC.brief_title: Phase IIIb Study Evaluate Effectiveness Safety Atazanavir/Ritonavir Single Enhanced Protease Inhibitor Therapy Human Immunodeficiency Virus ( HIV ) -Infected Subjects Evidencing Virologic Suppression
